## ProgressWindowOptions.minimumDisplayMs property

Minimum time (in ms) the window must remain visible once shown. This prevents jarring flashes for quick operations. Set to `false` to disable, or a number for custom duration. Default: 3000

**Signature:**

```typescript
minimumDisplayMs?: boolean | number;
```
